summary:
"Friday Night Lights" is an American TV show about a high school football team in the made-up town of Dillon, Texas. It's based on a book and movie of the same name. The show stars Kyle Chandler and Connie Britton as the football coach and his wife. It talks about important issues like family, racism, and drugs.

The series started in 2006 on NBC but had low ratings. To keep it going, NBC and DirecTV worked together. The show lasted for five seasons and won many awards for being realistic and showing deep character development.
title: Friday Night Lights (TV series)
